text: Bruno Ghedina (21 February 1943 â€“ 10 January 2021) was an Italian ice hockey player. He competed at the 1964 Winter Olympics. He played for SG Cortina. Ghedina won 8 times the scudetto. He was born in Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy. His career lasted from 1960 until 1975. Ghedina died on 10 January 2021 in Belluno, Italy at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Ice hockey players
title: Bruno Ghedina
